title: Did Stacey Abrams’ Sister Oversee a Court Case Involving Abrams?
subtitle: A Republican Congressman saw a conflict of interest involving the Abrams sisters in December 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 2020, U.S. District Court Judge Leslie Abrams Gardner ruled on a case to which her sister, Stacey Abrams, was a party.
